isis.stitle: 7 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS SPICER PS110-7, PS145-7 - REASSEMBLE - SHIFT TOWER

step1.para: Position the shift lever housing on edge in a vise.
Hold the shift lever so the cross hole in the lever aligns with the rock shaft cross holes in the lever housing.
Insert the rock shaft through the holes in the lever housing and the shift lever.
Assemble the rock shaft snap ring to the groove of the lever housing, locking the rock shaft in place.
Grease lightly and assemble the new seal to the lever housing. Grease the inner wall of the lever cover and slide it over the lever into position on the lever housing.
Assemble the spring, spring retainer, and boot over the shift lever. Depress the spring retainer and insert the pin through the hole in the lever.
Place the shift lever and tower assembly on the shifter housing with the gasket. Note that the finger enters the neutral position notches.
Secure the assembly with four bolts and lockwashers.
